item.title: Auto-Remediation with StackStorm & Splunk
item.description:
Oct 21, 2016
by Siddharth Krishna

Splunk is a great tool for collecting and analyzing log data. StackStorm is a great tool for automated event-driven remediation. So what happens when we stick them together? Hereâ€™s how to use Splunk to collect syslog data and trigger event-based network remediation workflows using StackStorm!
